title: Hillcrest ADU
description: Detached 800 SF accessory dwelling unit. Full design and permitting through City of San Diego. Maximized buildable area within setback constraints.

title: North Park Renovation
description: Full gut renovation of a 1940s bungalow. Opened floor plan, restored original hardwood, added rear kitchen extension with new structural beam.

title: Bankers Hill Office
description: 2,400 SF professional office suite. Custom millwork, exposed structural steel, integrated AV and lighting design throughout.

title: South Park Addition
description: 480 SF rear addition with new primary suite. Matched existing roofline, coordinated with structural and MEP consultants through full permit.

title: Logan Heights Mixed-Use
description: Ground-floor retail with 4 residential units above. ADU included on rear lot. Zoning variance secured for additional density.

title: Mission Hills Kitchen
description: Kitchen and dining expansion for a 1960s ranch house. Removed load-bearing wall, added skylight, custom cabinetry and new island throughout.

title: Ocean Beach Duplex
description: New detached duplex on a 5,000 SF lot. Coastal development permit coordination. Both units permitted for short-term rental.

title: Feasibility - Barrio Logan
description: Zoning and feasibility analysis for a 12,000 SF mixed-use development. Identified by-right density options and variance opportunities.
